title: Brexit 'bronde': the most flattering hair colour update of all time
text:
The jury’s out on whether blondes really do have more fun. However, we’re convinced that going bronde a la The Duchess of Cambridge, SJP, and J.Lo, is the mood boosting, Brexit stress busting, age-defying beauty hack of the season.

As we bid adieu to the sunshine, and say hello to grey skies, it’s not just our complexions that can begin to look dull and aged.

Our hair is also susceptible to appearing somewhat lacklustre during the autumn/winter months, as the lack of sunlight results in less light reflection.

However, by adding blonde highlights and balayage to lift and brighten your brown, “you capitalise on the most amount of light reflection possible,” shares Windle London colourist, Jack...
description: The jury’s out on whether blondes really do have more fun.
